thread.title: Charli XCX sets pulses racing in an edgy leather jacket and flares as she joins Vick Hope for a British GQ dinner at Chiltern Firehouse
thread.title_full: Charli XCX sets pulses racing in an edgy leather jacket and flares as she joins Vick Hope for a British GQ dinner at Chiltern Firehouse

author: ExpressDigest
title: Charli XCX sets pulses racing in an edgy leather jacket and flares as she joins Vick Hope for a British GQ dinner at Chiltern Firehouse
text: Charli XCX showed off her edgy sense of style in a black biker jacket as she joined Vick Hope for a dinner hosted by British GQ and Christian Louboutin on Thursday. The Boom Clap singer, 31, opted for the Noughties-inspired jacket as she joined the brands to celebrate music and style at London’s Chiltern Firehouse. She paired her fabulous garment with a pair of flared black trousers and black leather pointed stilettoes. To accessorise, Charli donned a chic black leather day and silver diamond earrings. Charlie – whose real name is Charlotte Emma Aitchison – pulled her look together with a bold wet-look hairdo and a cat-eye makeup look. Charli XCX (left) showed off her edgy sense of style in a black biker jacket as she joined Vick Hope (right) for a dinner hosted by British GQ and Christian Louboutin on Thursday The Boom Clap singer, 31, opted for the Noughties-inspired jacket as she joined the brands to celebrate music and style at London’s Chiltern Firehouse Also spotted at the star-studded event was Vick Hope, who looked sexy as she stepped out head to toe in red leather. The TV presenter, 34, sent pulses racing as she put on a leggy display in a very short ruby dress. She paired her fabulous garment with a matching oversized red leather jacket, which she had slung over her shoulders. Finishing off her gorgeous ensemble, Vick stepped out in a pair of black strappy heels and a black bag. To accessorise, she kept it simple with silver hoop earrings and a black and silver bracelet. Also looking fabulous in red for the event was Jessie Ware, who commanded attention in a floor-length max dress. The 39-year-old singer was the epitome of chic as she donned an elegant red dress which featured feathered layers and a sheer neckline. She kept her look trendy with a pair of colourful statement earrings, a black clutch and a pair of strappy black heels. Charlie – whose real name is Charlotte Emma Aitchison – pulled her look together with a bold wet-look hairdo and a cat-eye makeup look Vicky set pulses racing as she put on a leggy display in a very short ruby dress To accessorise, she kept it simple with silver hoop earrings and a black and silver bracelet Also looking fabulous in red for the event was Jessie Ware, who commanded attention in a floor-length max dress The 39-year-old singer was the epitome of chic as she donned an elegant red dress which featured feathered layers and a sheer neckline She kept her look trendy with a pair of colourful statement earrings, a black clutch and a pair of strappy black heels British GQ’s Head of Editorial Content, Adam Baidawi and fashion designer Christian Louboutin hosted an intimate dinner at Chiltern Firehouse in London. Celebrating excellence in music and style, guests in attendance included Adam Baidawi, Christian Louboutin, Charli XCX, AJ Tracey, Asake, Adekunle Gold, Will Kennard and Sault Milton (Chase & Status). Also at the glitzy event, Kenya Graze, Jessie Ware, Maisie Peters, Headie One, Caroline Polachek, Tiffany Calver, Yungblud, Grace Carter, Eve, Dizee Rascal, K Trap, Sheila Atim, Honey Dijon, Ghetts, Strandz and more were spotted. *** [Read more at DailyMail.co.uk](https://www.dailymail.co.uk/tvshowbiz/article-13142741/Charli-XCX-Vick-Hope-British-GQ-Christian-Louboutin-Londons-Chiltern-Firehouse.html?ns_mchannel=rss&ns_campaign=1490&ito=1490)
